Does more than 200 million people speak Spanish as a native language?	Yes.

Spanish underwent a dramatic change in the pronunciation of its sibilant consonants in 15th or 20th century?	Yes.
Spanish underwent a dramatic change in the pronunciation of its sibilant consonants in 15th or 20th century?	15th
How many international organizations use Spanish as one of the official languages?	Four.
How many international organizations use Spanish as one of the official languages?	Four
When u indicates a "hard g" pronunciation?	u is written between g and a front vowel e or i.
When u indicates a "hard g" pronunciation?	When u is written between g and a front vowel e or i
Where does the Spanish language evolved from?	Iberia.
Where does the Spanish language evolved from?	Vulgar Latin
How many official languages does the United Nations have?	Six.
How many official languages does the United Nations have?	Six
Is Spanish the native language of 22% of the population in Switzerland?	No.
Is Spanish the native language of 22% of the population in Switzerland?	No
Is Spanish written in the Latin script?	Yes, it is.

Does castellano the same as Spanish?	Yes
